optshare.index¶

optshare.index.index_data¶

optshare.index.index_data.get_current_index(index_symbol=None) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

target website: https://quote.eastmoney.com/center/hszs.html 支持上证指数、深证系列指数、指数成分、以及中证系列指数

Parameters

index_symbol (str or None) – index symbol or None

Returns

a row with detailed data given individual index symbol, otherwise whole data if index symbol is none

Return type

pandas.DataFrame

optshare.index.index_data.get_daily_index(index_symbol: str, start_date: str, end_date: str) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

东方财富网-中国股票指数-行情数据 https://quote.eastmoney.com/concept/sh603777.html?from=classic

Parameters

  • index_symbol (str) – 指数代码

  • start_date (str) – 开始日期

  • end_date (str) – 结束日期

Returns

行情数据

Return type

pandas.DataFrame
